Package org.example.utility.courses

Class ExcelUtility

java.lang.Object
org.example.utility.courses.ExcelUtility
public class ExcelUtility extends Object
Utility class for handling course data stored in an Excel file.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected static final String
    FILE_NAME
    The path to the Excel file containing course data.

      The path to the Excel file containing course data.

  • Constructor Details

    • ExcelUtility

      public ExcelUtility()

  • Method Details

    • loadCourseData

      public static void loadCourseData()
      Loads course data from the Excel file and populates the courseMap in CourseAssembly. Each row in the Excel file represents a course with details such as course code, name, and other attributes.

    • getAllCourseNames

      public static String[] getAllCourseNames()
      Retrieves all course names from the Excel file, formatted as "CourseCode - CourseName".
      Returns:
      An array of formatted course names.

    • getStringValue

      private static String getStringValue(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Cell cell)
      Extracts the string value from a given cell.
      Parameters:
      cell - The cell to extract the value from.
      Returns:
      The string value of the cell, or an empty string if the cell is null or not a string type.

    • getIntValue

      private static int getIntValue(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Cell cell)
      Extracts the integer value from a given cell.
      Parameters:
      cell - The cell to extract the value from.
      Returns:
      The integer value of the cell, or 0 if the cell is null or not numeric.
